name: OR_LNLG_DIAG_CPTS
description: This table contains the Diagnosis CPT codes for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: DX_CPT_CODE_1_ID
columns.description: The first Current Procedural Terminology (CPT (R)) code for this diagnosis.
